We're Glad You're Here

Cedar Grove Christian is a place where all are welcome. We believe in creating a loving environment where everyone can experience God's grace, grow in faith, and find a spiritual family.

Whether you're seeking answers, looking for connection, or wanting to deepen your faith journey, there's a place for you here.

New to Cedar Grove? Start with our Plan Your Visit page and see what we believe. Can’t be here in person? Catch the service on our Livestream.
